name: The Curse of Pestilence
description:
The lands of King Farakas are in peril. A mysterious plague is sweeping the countryside. Citizens are sick and dying. As a member of the Order of the Sword and Shield, you have been summoned to an audience with the king…

A choose-your-journey adventure story with multiple paths and 11 ending variations. Will you discover the source of the plague and save the land?
